Pre-Game Insights: Mexico lost the first leg against Honduras 2-0 in Tegucigalpa, and now they must win at the Estadio Azteca to advance.
Others: Mexico has not lost to Honduras in the last five matches, with a record of four victories and one draw.
If Mexico fails to win by a margin greater than three goals, they will face Trinidad and Tobago in the repechage for the Copa Am√©rica qualification.
